title: Self-rolling LED Boogie Dice light up a roomful of nerds
text:
Self-rolling LED 'Boogie Dice' light up a roomful of nerds 
Cnet Sunday 25th October, 2015 
If I ever get too lazy to roll my own dice, it's truly time to put me out to pasture. That's what I thought when I was first approached about reviewing a prototype pair of "...
